UuJokesCore.Joke.DetailView.info: <uu5string/>The component shows particular joke from database. Every user can rate the joke (except author) but only author and users with profile <UU5.Bricks.Code>Authorities</UU5.Bricks.Code> can modify the content. For more details visit documentation of the component <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/71f8d7b5cfdc4336b0abfe47b3cb237b/book/page?code=UuJokesJokeDetail' target='_blank'>UuJokes.Joke.Detail</UU5.Bricks.Link>.

UuJokesCore.Joke.ListView.info: <uu5string/>The list shows all jokes from the database with possibility of filtering and sorting. All users are able to view and rate jokes (except author) but only users with profile <UU5.Bricks.Code>Authorities</UU5.Bricks.Code> or <UU5.Bricks.Code>Executives</UU5.Bricks.Code> are allowed to create jokes. New jokes are visible only to authors and <UU5.Bricks.Code>Authorities</UU5.Bricks.Code> unless <UU5.Bricks.Code>Authorities</UU5.Bricks.Code> accept them visible for all. If you like particular joke you can easily copy it as component and place everywhere the dynamic content is supported (e.g. uuDockit). For more details visit documentation of the component <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/71f8d7b5cfdc4336b0abfe47b3cb237b/book/page?code=UuJokesJokeList' target='_blank'>UuJokes.Joke.List</UU5.Bricks.Link>.
UuJokesCore.Joke.ListView.copyJokeComponentSuccess: The component UuJokes.Joke.Detail has been inserted to clipboard

UuJokesCore.Joke.DetailView.UpdateModal.name: Name
UuJokesCore.Joke.DetailView.UpdateModal.textOrFile: Text or image must be provided.

UuJokesCore.Joke.DetailView.PreferenceMo.info: This form allows you to change configuration of shown joke details. You can hide or show jokes' categories, author or creation time. The modifications are saved in MyTerritory application and used next time you visit this component. When you copy the component the favorite configuration is copied too. If you require different configuration for copy just change value of the propertyComponent identifier (uu5Id).
